episodeTitle: Waiting in the New World! Farewell to the Courageous Pirates
episodeTitleJapanese: 新世界で待つ！勇ましき海賊との別れ
episodeTitleRomanized: Shinsekai de Matsu! Isamashiki Kaizoku to no Wakare
description: Luffy defeats Don Accino in an intense final battle using the Gomu Gomu no Hyakuman-do Bazooka. The Straw Hats recover their stolen flag with help from Lil, and escape as Lovely Land collapses. The Phoenix Pirates vow to reunite with the Straw Hats in the New World.

events.title: Luffy vs Don Accino Final Battle Begins
events.description: Luffy confronts Don Accino in the final battle of the Ice Hunter Arc. The environment becomes increasingly unstable with crumbling ice and rising lava as the fight intensifies.
events.significance: The climactic battle that concludes the entire Ice Hunter Arc and determines the fate of the stolen pirate flags.

events.title: Don Accino Uses Net Tire
events.description: Don Accino employs the Net Tire technique during his battle with Luffy, showcasing his heat-based combat abilities.
events.significance: Demonstrates the full extent of Don Accino's fighting capabilities in this anime-exclusive arc.

events.title: Don Accino's Steam Iron 10,000 Degree Press
events.description: Don Accino unleashes his powerful Steam Iron 10,000 Degree Press attack against Luffy, demonstrating the maximum heat capabilities of the Atsu Atsu no Mi Devil Fruit.
events.significance: Shows the peak offensive power of the Atsu Atsu no Mi, heating Don Accino's body to 10,000 degrees Celsius.

events.title: Luffy Uses Jet Pistol Against Don Accino
events.description: Luffy activates Gear Second and strikes Don Accino with a Jet Pistol, though the super-heated villain counters with a burning headbutt.
events.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's use of his advanced Gear Second techniques against a heat-based opponent.

events.title: Luffy's Jet Gatling vs Heat Attacks
events.description: Luffy counters Don Accino's heat-based assault with a rapid-fire Jet Gatling attack, showcasing the power of Gear Second against the 10,000-degree villain.
events.significance: Highlights Luffy's determination to overcome extreme heat through sheer willpower and speed.

events.title: Recovery of the Stolen Flags
events.description: With Lil's help convincing a bird-fish creature, the Straw Hats' flag and other stolen pirate flags are recovered. Robin uses her Devil Fruit powers to comfort Lil by drying her tears.
events.significance: Resolves the central conflict of the Ice Hunter Arc - the recovery of the stolen Jolly Roger flags.

events.title: Gomu Gomu no Hyakuman-do Bazooka
events.description: Luffy delivers the finishing blow to Don Accino with an anime-exclusive technique: the Gomu Gomu no Hyakuman-do Bazooka (1 Million Degree Bazooka). Despite his hands being burned by Don Accino's intense heat, Luffy declares his internal fire burns hotter and pushes through the pain to land the devastating attack.
events.significance: An anime-exclusive finishing technique that defeats the arc's main antagonist. The name references Don Accino's 10,000-degree heat, with Luffy claiming his spirit burns 100 times hotter.

quotes.text: My heat is hotter than yours!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Luffy declaring his determination surpasses Don Accino's physical heat before landing the finishing blow

events.title: Don Accino's Defeat
events.description: Don Accino is sent flying by Luffy's Hyakuman-do Bazooka, marking his defeat and the end of the Accino Family's reign over the Ice Hunter region.
events.significance: Concludes the main conflict of the Ice Hunter Arc with the villain's defeat.

events.title: Destruction of Lovely Land
events.description: The impact of Luffy's final attack causes Lovely Land, the Accino Family's ice castle headquarters, to collapse and be destroyed. The Straw Hats must quickly escape the crumbling structure.
events.significance: Marks the end of the Accino Family's base of operations and symbolizes the conclusion of the Ice Hunter Arc.

events.title: Straw Hats' Coordinated Escape
events.description: The Straw Hat crew executes a coordinated escape plan from the collapsing Lovely Land. Usopp carries the recovered flag and is launched back to the Thousand Sunny by Franky using his unique methods.
events.significance: Showcases the crew's teamwork and coordination even in chaotic situations.

events.title: Arbell and Lil's Reconciliation
events.description: Arbell apologizes to her younger sister Lil for neglecting her after marrying Salchow. The two sisters reconcile and are shown dancing together, resolving their familial conflict.
events.significance: Provides emotional closure to the sisters' subplot and shows redemption for the Accino Family members.

quotes.text: I'm sorry for being a bad sister. I promise to spend more time with you.
quotes.speaker: Arbell
quotes.context: Arbell apologizing to Lil for neglecting her

events.title: Accino Family's Belated Birthday Celebration
events.description: The defeated Accino Family sails away with Don Accino in tow and finally has their belated birthday celebration, showing they've moved past their defeat with good spirits.
events.significance: Provides a lighthearted conclusion to the antagonists' story, showing they aren't truly evil despite being bounty hunters.

events.title: Phoenix Pirates vs Campacino
events.description: The Phoenix Pirates engage in battle with Campacino and the remaining Accino Family members, settling their own score with the bounty hunters who had captured them.
events.significance: Allows the Phoenix Pirates to reclaim their honor and independence from the Accino Family.

events.title: Promise to Meet in the New World
events.description: Puzzle, captain of the Phoenix Pirates, promises to meet the Straw Hats again in the New World, vowing to become stronger and sail the dangerous seas ahead.
events.significance: Sets up a potential future reunion and emphasizes the theme of the New World as the ultimate destination for all pirates.

quotes.text: We'll meet again in the New World! I promise!
quotes.speaker: Puzzle
quotes.context: Puzzle's farewell to the Straw Hats as they depart

quotes.text: My heat is hotter than yours!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Declaring his determination surpasses Don Accino's heat

quotes.text: I'm sorry for being a bad sister. I promise to spend more time with you.
quotes.speaker: Arbell

quotes.text: We'll meet again in the New World! I promise!
quotes.speaker: Puzzle
quotes.context: Farewell promise to the Straw Hats

themes.description: Luffy overcomes Don Accino's extreme heat through sheer determination, declaring that his internal fire burns hotter than any Devil Fruit power.
themes.symbolism: The contrast between physical heat and spiritual fire represents the power of determination over raw strength.

themes.description: The reconciliation between Arbell and Lil shows that even antagonist families can resolve their conflicts and find happiness.
themes.symbolism: The sisters dancing together symbolizes healing and renewed familial bonds.

themes.description: Puzzle's promise to meet the Straw Hats in the New World reinforces the ongoing theme of the Grand Line's ultimate destination.
themes.symbolism: The New World represents the ultimate test for all pirates pursuing their dreams.

characterSpotlights.development: Luffy demonstrates his growth by overcoming a powerful heat-based opponent through willpower and determination, refusing to let physical pain stop him from achieving victory.
keyActions: Uses Gear Second techniques against Don Accino
Defeats Don Accino with Gomu Gomu no Hyakuman-do Bazooka
quotes: My heat is hotter than yours!

characterSpotlights.development: Don Accino is defeated but shown to be more comedic than truly evil, celebrating his birthday with family after the loss.
keyActions: Is defeated and celebrates birthday with family

characterSpotlights.development: Puzzle completes his character arc by fighting for his crew's honor and promising to meet the Straw Hats in the New World.
keyActions: Battles Campacino to reclaim Phoenix Pirates' honor
Promises to reunite with Straw Hats in New World
quotes: We'll meet again in the New World! I promise!

characterSpotlights.development: Lil helps the Straw Hats recover their flag and reconciles with her sister Arbell, finding family happiness.

mangaDifferences.difference: The entire Ice Hunter Arc is anime-only filler content with no manga counterpart. Episode 335 and all events within it do not appear in the original manga.
The Gomu Gomu no Hyakuman-do Bazooka technique is anime-exclusive and never appears in the manga.
Don Accino and the Atsu Atsu no Mi Devil Fruit are anime-only creations. A similar heat-based fruit (Netsu Netsu no Mi) later appears in the manga used by Charlotte Oven.

trivia.fact: This is the final episode of the Ice Hunter Arc, which spans episodes 326-335, making it a 10-episode filler arc.
The Gomu Gomu no Hyakuman-do Bazooka (1 Million Degree Bazooka) is an anime-exclusive technique that plays on Don Accino's 10,000-degree heat, with Luffy claiming his fire burns 100 times hotter.

sources.title: Gomu Gomu no Mi/Techniques - One Piece Wiki

trivia.fact: Episode 335 had no ending theme song. Starting from Episode 279, Toei Animation stopped airing ending themes and extended opening themes from 110 to 150 seconds.

sources.title: One Piece Music - One Piece Wiki

trivia.fact: The Ice Hunter Arc received mixed-to-negative reviews from fans, with critics noting it was too long for the amount of character development it provided. A 2024 review gave it 2/10 for characterization.

sources.title: One Piece Ice Hunter Arc Summary - Poggers

trivia.fact: Don Accino's Atsu Atsu no Mi is similar to Charlotte Oven's canonical Netsu Netsu no Mi, making it one of several filler Devil Fruits that later received canonical counterparts.

sources.title: Non-Canon Devil Fruits That Got A Canonical Counterpart - GameRant

trivia.fact: Campacino and Brindo's Combination Play magnetic abilities are not Devil Fruit powers, but rather a natural ability the twin brothers possess.
